00022     public:
00023         Surface();

00025                  double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00026                  double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv);

00030                                 double Ryz, double Ryw, double Rzw,
00031                                 double Tx, double Ty, double Tz, double Tw);

00033 
00034         virtual void Project (double ScrW, double CamW, bool DepthCue4D);

00038                             double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00039                             double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv);

00042                                     double _c = 0, double _d = 0);
00043 
00044         vec4vec2D Data (void) { return X; }
00045

00048          virtual function_type normal;
